original_text: Then the devil took him to the holy city and set him on the pinnacle of the temple
korean_text: 이에 마귀가 예수를 거룩한 성으로 데려다가 성전 꼭대기에 세우고

sentences.original_text: Then the devil took him to the holy city
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 마귀가 그를 거룩한 성으로 데려갔습니다

sentences.original_text: and set him on the pinnacle of the temple
